content: this crochet cowl neck warmer pattern will walk you step by step through creating the eunoia twisted crochet cowl this crochet cowl pattern is fairly fast and straight forward using basic stitches to create a beautiful textured crochet infinity cowl perfect for staying warm and cozy in cold weather this crochet cowl pattern looks great in any color and dressed up with a cozy sweater dress or dressed down with jeans and a jacket this is a fast make that is great for gifting **skill level ** easy/advanced beginner- this crochet infinity cowl pattern uses mostly single_crochet and double_crochet which makes the crochet pattern accessible to advanced beginners you will also use front post half_double_crochet and back post half_double_crochet to create the ribbing around the edge you will need to know how to work into the bottom of the chains as this crochet pattern requires doing so in the first round if you haven t done this before i would recommend practicing a bit before you attempt this pattern **note ** if you have any concerns about whether this pattern is in your skill level please review the free version of the pattern that is available on theloopholefox com the crochet cowl pattern that is free on my blog is not as robust as the pdf pattern which includes a photo tutorial as well as the steps written out in full sentence detail within the tutorial however you can look at the pattern and stitches required to determine whether or not the pattern is in your skill level **pattern includes ** 1 full version pdf with photo tutorial that is 9 pages long this photo tutorial has the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf with only one picture and 4 pages to save ink **terms used ** us standard pattern is written in english **size ** circumference approx 28 inches height approx 8 inches there are instructions within the pdf that explain how to change the size of this crochet cowl pattern if you prefer **materials required ** bulky 5 weight yarn of your choice you will need approximately 5 3 oz/ 150g/ 200 yards yarn used we crochet swish bulky in nutmeg heather **tools ** 6 5 mm k-10 5 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope the eunoia cowl pattern brings you as much joy as it s brought me happy crocheting the loophole fox
